testcase.name: [sut] Prepare SUT: Reset Redis-DB used by rspamd _raw_params=redis-cli -s /var/run/redis/rspamd.sock flushall
[client] client: Send a mail from client to an address SUT is responsible for _raw_params=echo "Test-Body" | mailx -s "Test" jane.doe@mydomain.test

testcase.name:
[sut] sut: Assert mail is received and delivered at SUT file={{ find_result.files[0].path }}, with_content=Return-Path: <vagrant@localhost> Delivered-To: jane.doe@mydomain.test Received: from sut.mydomain.test $$ \t $$by sut.mydomain.test with LMTP $$ \t $$id $$ .* $$ $$ \t $$(envelope-from <vagrant@localhost>) $$ \t $$for <jane.doe@mydomain.test>; $$ .* $$ Received: from localhost (ip-10.0.3.201.someisp.test [10.0.3.201]) $$ \t $$by sut.mydomain.test (Postfix) with ESMTP id $$ .* $$ $$ \t $$for <jane.doe@mydomain.test>; $$ .* $$ Received: by localhost (Postfix, from userid 1000) ... Date: $$ .* $$ To: jane.doe@mydomain.test Subject: Test ... From: vagrant@localhost ...
Test-Body

[sut] sut: Assert the received mail is tagged as Spam due to sending from client with hostname localhost (ip-10.0.3.201.someisp.test) file={{ find_result.files[0].path }}, with_content=... To: jane.doe@mydomain.test Subject: Test ... $$ \t $$ HFILTER_FROMHOST_NOT_FQDN(3.00)[localhost]; ... $$ \t $$ HFILTER_HELO_5(3.00)[localhost]; ... X-Rspamd-Server: sut X-Spam: Yes
Test-Body
